original_text: They were the same living things that I had seen beside the Kebar River when they were under Israel's God. I realized that they were cherubs.
korean_text: 그것은 내가 그발 강 가에서 보던 이스라엘의 하나님 아래에 있던 생물이라 그들이 그룹인 줄을 내가 아니라

sentences.original_text: They were the same living things
that I had seen beside the Kebar River
when they were under Israel's God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이스라엘의 하나님 아래 있을 때

sentences.original_text: I realized that they were cherubs
